::Savanna:;

She looked at HotRod. "Don't those guys know when to quit?"
She growled and readie her claws for battle.

------Original message---
--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, richard f allen <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod, worryed that the Preds might attack, checks the Fire's 
sensors.
> He picks up several Predicon signals, heading right at the ship.
> He hits the Red Alert alarm, and calls out to the Maximals.
> "Maximals, we've got Predicons approching. Prepare for battle!"
